interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Zeitun Natural Anti Cellulite Body Scrub - Organic Coffee Body Scrub Exfoliator With Robusta & Dead Sea Salt - Cinnamon, Ginger And Moisturizing Oils, 7 oz Review Date: 2020/09/28 Store: Zeitun Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 5.91 x 8.27 inches; 7 Ounces'} Review Text: This scrub smells wonderful, just like ground coffee. It also does a good job of scrubbing my skin.

However, it is just super messy. It is not a cream consistency like most scrubs, it is very loose like plain coffee grounds would be. Review Title: Messy Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Pantene Pro-v Ultimate 10 Bb Conditioner With Pump, 28.9 Fluid Ounce Pantene ["Multitask like you mean it with Pantene Pro-V Ultimate 10 BB Conditioner. BB stands for beauty boosting and this conditioner's formula works overtime to help tame fly-aways, repair roughness, infuse silky softness, add brilliant shine, smooth, control frizz, boost moisture, detangle, make hair manageable, and help keep your strands strong against damage. Help solve your hair problems from dryness to dullness with this 10in1 conditioner for flawlessly healthy hair. Also try it with the shampoo and treatment in the Pantene Pro-V Ultimate 10 Collection."] {'Brand': 'Pantene', 'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Detangle', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Softness', 'Product Dimensions': '2.94 x 9.38 x 3.94 inches; 2.05 Pounds', 'Item model number': '10080878183309', 'UPC': '080878183302', 'Manufacturer': 'Procter & Gamble, Haba Hub'} I love this conditioner. It works and smells great. Love it Pantene Pro-V Ultimate 10 BB Conditioner - 24 fl oz Pantene ['View larger', 'Collections', 'Ready to take the dare to get your healthiest hair ever? Since 1945, Pantene’s passion has been healthy, lustrous hair – giving you everything you need to let your hair shine. Pantene has the answer to all your hair questions, offering a range of solutions to meet your hair needs and achieve healthy, flawless, oh-so-shiny strands.', 'Find the Pantene that works for you, and experience for yourself why Pantene is the world’s number one hair care brand.', 'Gold Standard of Hair', 'Pantene: Dare to give your hair the Gold Standard. This Season, The HOTTEST hair news is coming from Pantene! One of the most-loved haircare brands in history.', 'Innovative Ingredients, Stylers & Treatments', 'Check out our amazing hair health infusions & luscious treatments.', 'View larger', "The World's No1*", 'Discover for yourself why Pantene is the No1 Haircare Brand in the World*', '*based on 2012 volume sales data worldwide', 'View larger', 'Volume Collection: Shampoo, Conditioner & Root Lifting Spray Gel', 'Dare to go big for 24 hours. Volume Collection: Turn flat hair into thick, full 24-hour volume* with a plumping effect inspired by collagen.', '*3-step system of volume shampoo, conditioner, and root lifting spray gel', 'View larger', 'Smooth Collection: Shampoo, Conditioner & Shine Serum', 'Dare to go 72 hour smooth.* Smooth System: Stay smooth all summer. Moroccan Argan Oil in a Pro-V system helps lock out humidity and keeps frizz from forming.', '*Smooth shampoo and conditioner system', 'View larger', 'Daily Moisture Renewal Collection: Shampoo, Conditioner & Silky Moisture Whip', 'Dare to erase the damage of 100 blow-drys.* Daily Moisture Renewal: The Pro-V System Nourishes to help lock in moisture and fight blow-dry damage.', '*Damage to smoothness and shine', 'View larger', 'Color Preserve Shine Collection: Shampoo & Conditioner', 'Dare to fight fade wash after wash. Pantene Color Preserve Shine gives color treated hair a new protective outer layer and leaves hair vibrant.', 'View larger', 'Pro-V Stylers: Your Hair Style Essentials', 'Dare to do the Style, Not the Damage. Pantene Pro-V Stylers: Try Pantene’s complete line of styling products. A full range of Pro-V formulas to smooth, add volume, protect, or hold your hair healthy style all day.'] {'Package Dimensions': '9.5 x 4.9 x 3.8 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '080878175338 796433577324', 'Manufacturer': 'Pantene'} This is my usual conditioner but I've been looking for a bigger bottle that doesn't have the pump top. This fits the bill great. Now this will last me a while Taya Beauty Inner Core Hair Strong Anti-Breakage Shampoo & Conditioner Duo - Strengthening and Repairing Formula - Free From Sulfates and Parabens - 8 fl oz Bottles TAYA I AM. ['INNER CORE SHAMPOO: Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Acrylates Copolymer, Glycerin, Glycol Distearate, Bambusa Vulgaris Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Panthenol, Dimethicone, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol, Bis-Cetearyl Amodimethicone, Polyquaternium-11, Laureth-4, Laureth-23, Decylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Amodimethicone, Cocamide MIPA, Trideceth-12, Kaolin, Polysorbate 20, Fragrance/Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Coconut Acid, Sodium Methyltaurate, Isopropanolamine, Tocopherol, Salicylic Acid, Cyclotetrasiloxane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool. INNER CORE CONDITIONER: Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Polysorbate 60, Bambusa Vulgaris Extract, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Dimethicone, Divinyldimethicone/Dimethicone Copolymer, Polyquaternium-37, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Dicetyldimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Polyquaternium-7, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Cetyl Alcohol, Trideceth-12, C11-15 Pareth-7, C12-13 Pareth-23, C12-13 Pareth-3, Decylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, PEG-90M, Tetrasodium EDTA, Buteth-3, C10-40 Isoalkylamidopropylethyldimonium Ethosulfate, Sodium Benzotriazolyl Butylphenol Sulfonate, Laureth-9, Tributyl Citrate, Citric Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Kaolin, Yellow 6/CI 15985, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbitan Oleate, Acrylates/Stearyl Methacrylate Copolymer, C10-11 Isoparaffin, Isopropyl Alcohol, Trisodium HEDTA, Silica, BHT, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool.'] {'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Repairing,Cleanses,Breakage', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'TAYA I AM.', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Color Treated, Curly, Damaged, Thin', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 4.53 x 2.09 inches; 1 Pounds', 'Item model number': '3.00', 'UPC': '858308002185'} This shampoo and conditioner combo made my hair very soft. It also smells very good, which is something I'm picky about. I also like the unique twist bottles.

As far as breakage, there hasn't been any change from my usual shampoo and conditioner. I am still shedding quite a bit. I like it Feather Headbands Hippie Dreamcatcher Head Chains Boho Tribal Feather Headpiece Peacock Feather Hair Band Hair Accessories (E) NSLS {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Item model number': 'F-0617-C'} The feathers in this head band are absolutely perfect. I like that it can be adjusted to fit any size head.

I was a little disappointed that the dreamcatcher part is made out macrame, it would have been much nicer to have an actual dreamcatcher. Pretty hippie head band Wonder4 Electric Callus Remover - Rechargeable Electric Foot File Callus Shaver Hard Skin Remover Pedicure Tools with 3 in 1 Roller Heads, for Cracked Heels Calluses and Dead Skin Wonder4 {'Brand': 'Wonder4', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Roller', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '11.4 Ounce'} [[VIDEOID:a9343ecf3ac0b76f3c3f1156cafb9e89]] This foot filter is easy to hold, and I really like that there are three different grained heads that rotate, but stay attached. You don't have to constantly change the heads on this.

However, when you rotate the heads you have to hold down a button on one side and then use the very small rotater to change heads. It makes it a bit difficult to change the heads.

Also, I had problems with it constantly stopping while I was using it. And my calluses aren't even that bad. If you just have a bit of dry skin this will probably work for you, otherwise you're going to want to skip it. Not very powerful Zeitun Natural Anti Cellulite Body Scrub - Organic Coffee Body Scrub Exfoliator With Robusta & Dead Sea Salt - Cinnamon, Ginger And Moisturizing Oils, 7 oz Zeitun {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 5.91 x 8.27 inches; 7 Ounces'} This scrub smells wonderful, just like ground coffee. It also does a good job of scrubbing my skin.

However, it is just super messy. It is not a cream consistency like most scrubs, it is very loose like plain coffee grounds would be. Messy
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus**: The user prioritizes moisturizing and conditioning products for dry hair, consistently addressing breakage and damage.

- **Preference for Multipurpose Products**: They value items that deliver various benefits, such as detangling and frizz control, underscoring their commitment to multifunctional solutions that tackle multiple hair concerns.

- **Quality Assurance & Brand Loyalty**: The user's appreciation for high-quality products remains evident through positive ratings for trusted brands known for effectiveness.

- **Sensory Enjoyment**: They prioritize pleasant fragrances in hair care products, enhancing their overall satisfaction, particularly with the softness and aroma of the products.

- **Satisfaction with Results**: Feedback indicates contentment with product performance in promoting hair softness and health, despite ongoing shedding concerns.

- **Expanded Interest in Accessories and Grooming Tools**: The user has developed an affinity for hair accessories and personal care tools, including multifunctional grooming devices for foot health, showcasing a broader interest in enhancing their personal style and grooming routines.

- **Emerging Interest in Body Care**: Recent interactions reveal a newfound interest in body care products, specifically exfoliators that enhance skin texture. However, they express some concerns regarding usability, citing messiness in recent purchases.

Overall, the user seeks effective hair care solutions while exploring personal grooming tools and stylish accessories that enhance both their personal grooming and overall aesthetic.
